name: flint-monolith
description: Flint monolith repository with frontend, backend, and shared code

scripts.install:all: cd shared && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.copy:shared: cd frontend && npm run copy:shared && cd ../backend && npm run copy:shared
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run copy:shared && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run copy:shared && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint:all: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
